acceptanceCriteria: Initialize Vite+React+TS project, remove boilerplate, install deps (dexie, lucide-react, d3-force, simplex-noise, html2canvas), create src structure.
Create index.css with CSS variables for all colors, typography, spacing, and animations defined in AGENTS.md.
Implement the main application shell with full-height layout, void background, and mobile-responsive container.
Build the 'Editor' component: centered textarea, DM Sans font, strictly vanilla CSS. Text must exist in state.
Implement visual decay logic: text opacity reduces over 24h period (simulated for dev).
Implement purgatory phases (WAITING, DRIFTING, FADING, DISSOLVING) based on decay progress. Display current phase visually.
Set up Dexie.js IndexedDB schema for thoughts. Store content, createdAt, emotion. Auto-save on type with debounce.
Build 'Solidify' feature: export thought as PNG image (1080x1080 SQUARE, 1080x1920 STORY) with gradient background using html2canvas.
Implement mouse-following sage-green glow background at 60fps. Smooth animation using requestAnimationFrame.
Implement typing speed visualization on background using simplex-noise. Particles react to keystroke frequency.
Implement keyword-based sentiment analysis to detect emotion (joy, peace, melancholy, anxiety, anger, love, confusion). Store emotion with thought.
Build 'Living Garden' view: force-directed graph using d3-force showing preserved thoughts as flowers. Emotion-based clustering and procedural flower generation.
Implement Garden export in SQUARE, STORY, and PRINT (2400x3000) formats.
Build cinematic landing page with warp-speed entry transition into the sanctuary.
Implement first-visit overlay with gentle introduction for new users. Show only once (localStorage flag).
